subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Bud Delp was the Hall of Fame thoroughbred trainer who saddled the brilliant colt Spectacular Bid, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness in 1979.
snippet: Bud Delp was the Hall of Fame thoroughbred trainer who saddled the brilliant colt Spectacular Bid, the winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness in 1979.
